insight.file_summary: Top-level script to invoke helloworld implementation.
insight.complexity_notes: Simple script with a single entry point.

insight.file_summary: Sets up a Python package with a version number from a file

methods.name: setup
methods.description: Sets up the Python package with the given version number

insight.complexity_notes: Uses setuptools for package setup and io for file I/O

insight.file_summary: Top-level implementation of the helloworld program.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main entry point of the program.

insight.complexity_notes: The program uses argparse for command-line argument parsing and helloworld for version information.

insight.file_summary: Reads the version from a file and assigns it to a global variable

methods.name: __read_version_txt
methods.description: Reads the version from a file named 'VERSION.txt' in the 'helloworld' package

insight.complexity_notes: Uses pkgutil to read data from a package resource
